title: From the Vault: Ghosts of the Wind and Rain
itunes:title: From the Vault: Ghosts of the Wind and Rain
description:
Strange presences walk the shore before the coming of the storm. Terrible forms move in its wake. In this classic episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind, Robert and Joe discuss a wide selection of ghosts and monsters connected to destructive weather patterns. (originally published 10/14/2021)

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
